scenario_text.value:
(I thought for sure we were in for more
forest after we got over this pass, but...)
Finally! I can see the amusement park!
Well that took just about forever!

Ah, so that structure beyond those trees is
an “amusement park.”
That’s the biggest building I’ve ever seen.

Miu’s in there, somewhere. Don’t worry, Sis,
I’m coming for you!

Whoa, Takuma! That giant ring I saw yesterday
is there too!
It’s called a Ferris wheel.
Look at all the colorful buildings!

That’s an amusement park for you. Just
looking around one is fun.

Hey, this is no time to be getting carried
away.
Sorry.

Oh, come on. Where’s the harm in letting us
have a little fun?

No, Shuuji’s right. Don’t forget one of us is
obsessed with finding his sister.

Minoru, try to imagine how Kaito must be
feeling, okay?

Just hold on, Miu! I’ll find you as soon as
I can!

Kaito, I know you’re worried, but try to keep
it under control, okay?

Focus too much on one thing, and you’re just
asking to get blindsided.
I know that!

You, on the other hand, could do with a bit
more focus, Minoru.

You can say that again. Haru and Miyuki are
sharper than you are, Minoru.
Miyuki, we’re almost there.
We’re almost there...
My bad...
Anyway, we’re not far now.

And since we’ve got no idea who or what might
be inside, we should be careful.
